meanings.definition: A person or thing that distorts.
meanings.sent1: The distorters of truth spread misinformation.
meanings.sent2: The artist used various distorters to create a unique painting.
meanings.sent3: The funny distorters in the funhouse mirrors made everyone look silly.
meanings.sent4: The distorters of reality clouded people's judgment.
meanings.sent5: The distorters in the carnival mirrors made people look like giants or dwarfs.

meanings.sent1: The distorters in the image were clearly visible.
meanings.sent2: The distorters of sound affected the quality of the music.
meanings.sent3: The distorters on the map made it challenging to navigate.
meanings.sent4: The distorters of perception can lead to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The distorters in the glass made everything appear wavy.
